column15:
‚úÖ All health tracking in one place

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, diet, and medication? We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that you and your health professional can get the full picture.

‚úÖ Reclaim control over your well-being

Bearable empowers people to reclaim control over their well-being by making mood and symptom tracking simple, convenient, and accessible to all. Making entries in our health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.  

The app has been shaped by our community of thousands of people with varying chronic health issues.

‚úÖ Gain useful insights with just a few clicks a day

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health.


Bearable helps you to:

‚úîÔ∏è Record your mood and symptoms in seconds, or go into more detail with an additional note. 
‚úîÔ∏è Fully customise your daily activities and health factors, such as sleep, diet, exercise and medication/supplements. 
‚úîÔ∏è Gain insights into how your daily activities and health factors impact your mood and symptoms using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.
‚úîÔ∏è Keep everything in one place with our neat health timeline, so that you can get the full picture. Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
‚úîÔ∏è Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment - no need to struggle to remember a detailed health timeline for the last week or month.
‚úîÔ∏è Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

‚ûï Set Reminders - Fully customise your reminders, whether its a general reminder to make a diary entry or a reminder to take your medication and supplements. 
‚ûï Share and Export -  Export data securely to yourself or your health professional
‚ûï Automatic health data sync - You can choose to allow the app to automatically gather data such as Sleep and Steps taken from your phone.
‚ûï Dark mode - Change at night to a display easier on the eyes.
‚ûï Restore data across devices - Restore your data between Apple & Android devices.


üîê PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can delete it from within the app at any time.  It‚Äôs important to emphasise that we will never under any circumstances sell any personal data to anyone.


üíü MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves.  With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic diseases and both mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, IBS and IBD.  Our aim is to make our symptom tracker simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most.  We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health.  If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to james@bearable.app.  We‚Äôd love to hear from you.




Credit to Freepik for icons
column18:
Meet Bearable - a simple, customizable health tracker and journal that empowers you to understand the correlation between anything you do and the impact it has on your Health. 

Tired of juggling multiple apps to keep track of your mood, symptoms, sleep, exercise, habits, diet, and medication? 

We think all of this should be kept in one convenient place so that we can help you spot patterns, share better information with medical professionals, and have more control over your health.

Making entries in our holistic health diary is quick and effortless, so you can focus more energy on getting better.


UNIQUE INSIGHTS WITH JUST A FEW CLICKS PER DAY

With just a few simple clicks each day our intelligent health diary can help you to gain insights into which daily activities and health factors are positively and negatively affecting your mental and physical health, using our graphs, calendar and stats pages.


BEARABLE HELPS YOU TO...

- Record your mood, energy, sleep, symptoms, habits, medication, and bowel movements in seconds
- Fully customize your daily activities and health factors, such as diet, social life, exercise, or your medication & supplements.
- Spot health patterns.
- Use our search function to filter just what you want to see or show your health professional.
- Come prepared to your next doctor or therapist appointment
- Make journaling a healthy habit with our quick, simple and enjoyable entry process.

And there‚Äôs much more‚Ä¶

+ Customisable Reminders for diary entries, medication, and more.
+ Automatically Sync Health Data from Apple Health and Apple Health Kit.
+ Restore data across devices
+ Secure Data Export
+ Dark mode


CUSTOMER REVIEWS

‚ÄúI prefer this app over other mood tracking apps because of the level of detail; you can track mood, symptoms, sleep, and even weather... Ive found it super helpful.‚Äù

‚ÄúCovers every potential category you would want in a health tracking app. Very customizable. It tracks stats and helps you draw correlations. Ive been looking for something like this for a long time.‚Äù

‚ÄúI have a lot of physical and mental health symptoms due to stress from daily life. I have been struggling to find patterns and triggers for those symptoms and how they relate to whats happening in my day. This app allows me to track EVERYTHING.


PRIVATE & SECURE

Rest easy knowing your data is encrypted securely on our servers. You have full control over your data and can export it or delete it from within the app at any time. It‚Äôs important to emphasize that we will never under any circumstances sell any data to anyone.


MADE BY PEOPLE WHO UNDERSTAND AND CARE

Created by individuals who have lived with health issues themselves. With feedback and feature requests from a research group of thousands of people with a wide variety of chronic mental and physical health conditions, including Anxiety, Depression, CFS (ME), MS (Multiple Sclerosis), Fibromyalgia, Endometriosis, Bipolar, BPD, PTSD, Arthritis, Crohns, Diabetes, Migraines, Headaches, Vertigo, Cancer (Chemo Symptoms), IBS and IBD.

Our aim is to make journaling simple and accessible to everyone, even if suffering from the fatigue and brain fog that often accompanies many conditions.


JUST SOME OF THE WAYS OUR COMMUNITY USES BEARABLE

Mood Tracker
Mental Health Tracker
Self-Care Journal
Medication Tracker
Habit Tracker
Anxiety Tracker
Depression Tracker
Symptom Tracker


GET IN TOUCH

We have created a real sense of community around Bearable and will continue to listen closely to those who need it most. We are committed to continue improving upon this app that could help many people start to feel like they can reclaim control over their health. 

If you have any questions, feedback or feature requests, please send them over to support@bearable.app. We‚Äôd love to hear from you.

Website - https://bearable.app/

Terms and Conditions - https://bearable.app/terms-and-conditions/

Privacy Policy - https://bearable.app/privacy-policy/

column15:
Wish to build confidence and have higher self esteem? Want to learn how to become more successful and enjoy the power of inner-monologue?

IMPROVING SELF LOVE AND SELF ESTEEM IS SIMPLE
Throw away your negative thoughts. Accept your positive thoughts. Learn to identify your inner conversation and respond to real life thoughts. Train daily and improve your self esteem and wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
The app is shown to improve supportive thinking and reduce maladaptive beliefs in 7 published academic papers.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô ongoing interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, and maladaptive behaviours.

HOW DO I FEEL SELF LOVE
The foundations of healthy self worth and self esteem are built upon beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that "everything in my life needs to be prefect", I wont be able to live up to these expectations and my confidence will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. With daily affirmations, we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self-talk. We can change our beliefs and get rid of thinking patterns that negatively affect our confidence and self-esteem.

HOW THE APP WORKS
The app is designed to:
1. Increase your awareness of negative thoughts
2. Train you to identify and challenge negative thoughts
3. Increase your daily access to affirmations and supportive thoughts
4. Increase the automaticity of helpful thinking
5. Provide daily affirmations for confidence and self-esteem boost

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining self esteem during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

GET TO KNOW YOUR THOUGHTS
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes negative self talk - throw it away by dragging it on-screen. If the thought promotes positive or neutral thinking, accept it by dragging it towards you.
The more we train, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your confidence, start today! We believe apps allow us to learn and train quickly and effectively. GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 2-4 minutes.

BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY TO SELF LOVE
The apps many topics and themes are broken down into more than 500 levels. Each level has a pool of self-talk thoughts. Users are required to complete a random set of thoughts to complete the level.
To further strengthen learning of supportive self-talk, each level the player completes is followed by a memory game in which one has to identify a supportive statements that appeared in the previous level.

The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty, fear of abandonment, and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

Training using this application, allows for gradual, steady learning of more adaptive self-talk thereby helping to break the vicious thought cycle maintaining low self-esteem.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GGTUDE APPS
Visit our website: http://ggapps.net

OTHER APPS BY GG
GG Self Care & Mood Tracker
GG OCD Anxiety & Depression
GGBI: Body Image Distress & Preoccupation
column18:
Missing out on what life has to offer because of low self esteem? Get your self-esteem back on track with research-backed methods based on Cognitive Behavioural Therapy. Join 100,000+ people who already enjoy more confidence!

HOW CAN IMPROVING SELF-LOVE BE SO SIMPLE?
We tend to overcomplicate things. Research shows our mind can learn and adapt by using the power of helpful thinking. There are multiple published studies that show this app to be effective for body image, obsessions, self esteem and even depression!

Whats the story behind the app?
The app is the result of collaboration between a game developer and a clinical psychologist. When we created this app, we wanted it to be as effective as possible, and to take only 3 minutes a day to complete and improve. So when we published the first version, Prof. Guy Doron began researching the impact of the daily training. We found that within 14 days, users managed to build mental resilience that lasted for additional 30 days!

IMPROVING CONFIDENCE IS SIMPLE
Throw away your negative thoughts. Accept your positive thoughts. Learn to identify your inner conversation and respond to real life thoughts. Train daily and improve your self esteem and wellness.

SCIENCE BACKED
New findings support the effectiveness of the core mechanism used in GG apps.
According to CBT models, negative self talk ‚Äì individuals‚Äô interpretations of the self, others and the world - maintain psychological difficulties such as low self esteem, mood, and maladaptive behaviours. 

HOW DO I BUILD MY SELF-ESTEEM?
The foundations of healthy confidence and self esteem are built upon beliefs. Our beliefs have the potential to bias and affect our ability to deal with daily situations. For example, if I believe that "everything in myself needs to be prefect", I wont be able to live up to these expectations and my confidence will decrease.

BELIEFS AND SELF TALK
Beliefs and self talk are interrelated. Once we learn to embrace healthier and more adaptive self-talk, it can change our beliefs and help us get rid of the ones that negatively affect our confidence and self esteem.

IS THIS APP SIMILAR TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPY?
Our app platform is not designed to be used as a therapy or treatment, however:
1. It is being used by CBT therapists as a complementing tool.
2. It helps in maintaining self esteem during or after therapy.
3. It is found to relieve symptoms of anxiety, worries, obsessions and more. 

HELPFUL THINKING
The basic task in the app is simple - you will be presented with thoughts. If the thought promotes unhelpful self talk - throw it away by swiping it up. If the thought promotes positive or helpful thinking, accept it by swiping it down.

The more we train, the more automatic this process becomes.
 
HOW MUCH SHOULD I TRAIN EACH DAY?
To feel better and improve your confidence, start today! GG Apps are designed to be most effective in short training sessions. You are advised to complete up to 3 levels per day, which should only take between 3-4 minutes.

LEVELS AND TOPICS
The apps many topics and themes are broken down into more than 500 levels. Each level has a pool of self talk statements (or thoughts).
The topics include: self esteem, belief in change, self criticism, negative thinking, coping, positive boost, comparing, perfectionism, emotions, social fears, self as an object, danger and threat, seeing the beauty, fear of abandonment, and more.

You can also test yourself to see how well your confidence progresses with our self assessment tool.

LEARN MORE ABOUT THE FACTS BEHIND GGTUDE APPS
Visit our website: http://ggtude.com/research

---

http://ggapps.net/terms-of-use

DISCLAIMER: The information on this app is not intended to be a substitution for diagnosis, treatment, or informed professional advice. You should not take any action or avoid taking any action without consulting with a qualified mental health professional.

column10: Daylio is an intuitive, easy to use mood tracking app that is available to users for free (although users can purchase a subscription for $23.99 annually in order to unlock increased customization and the ability to export entries). A highlight of the app is its versatility, as users can track moods, sleep, food, activity, chores, and goals. Another highlight secure privacy protections - data is stored exclusively on the device/not sent to a server, and users can create a PIN to access the app on their phone.

column15:
Daylio enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed & stunningly simple micro-diary app right now for FREE!


üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a very versatile app, and you can turn it in whatever you need to track. Your fitness goal pal. Your mental health coach. Your food log. Your gratitude diary. Mood tracker. Exercise, meditate, eat, and be grateful. Take care of your mental, emotional, and physical health. Good self-care is a key to improved mood and reduced anxiety.

This is the time for your wellbeing, self-improvement, and self-care. Use Daylio as your daily bullet journal. We build it on three principles:

‚úÖ Reach happiness and self-improvement by being mindful of your days.
‚úÖ Validate your hunches. How does your new hobby influence your life?
‚úÖ Form a new habit in an obstacle-free environment‚Äîno learning curve. Daylio is super simple to use, create your first entry in two steps.

For anxiety and stress relief, make sure to include activities that help you to cope with negativity. Everybody can use a mood boost! You can measure their impact on your mood in stats. 


ü§î HOW DOES IT WORK

Pick your mood and add activities you have been doing during the day. You can also add notes and keep an old school diary. Daylio is collecting recorded moods and activities in the statistics and calendar. This format will help you to understand your habits better. Keep track of your activities and create patterns to become more productive!

You can review all entries in the statistics on charts or the calendar and share them with your friends.

To make it even better, Daylio allows you:
‚≠ê Make reflection a daily habit
‚≠ê Discover what makes you happy
‚≠ê Use a big database of beautiful icons for your personalized activities 
‚≠ê Mix and match your own moods using funny emojis
‚≠ê Explore exciting statistics about your life on weekly, monthly or yearly charts
‚≠ê Deep dive into advanced statistics for every mood, activity or group
‚≠ê Customize color themes
‚≠ê Enjoy nights with dark mode
‚≠ê See your whole year in Year in Pixels
‚≠ê Create daily, weekly or monthly goals and motivate yourself
‚≠ê Build habits and collect achievements
‚≠ê Share statistics with your friends
‚≠ê Safely back up and restore your entries via your private Google Drive
‚≠ê Set reminders and never forget to create a memory
‚≠ê Turn on PIN lock and keep your diary safe
‚≠ê Export PDF and CSV documents to share or print your entries


üßê PRIVACY AND SECURITY

We are a top private journal since we do not store or collect your data.

At Daylio, we believe in transparency and honesty. Your data is stored locally on your phone. You can optionally schedule backups to your private cloud storage or take your backup file with you anywhere. Data are entirely under your control at all times.

Data stored in the apps private directories are not accessible by any other apps or processes. Your backups are transferred to the Google Drive via the secure (encrypted) channels.

We dont send your data to our servers. We dont have access to your entries. Also, any other third-party app cant read your data.
